rules.description: Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Change ⌃+u(模拟终端 Control+u) --> ^+⇧+⬅️ => ⌘+x .
Change semicolon to control if pressed with other keys.
Change spacebar to HyperKey if pressed with other keys.
Tap Shift_R (⇧) → Switch input source (F15)  |  短按右 Shift (⇧) → 切换输入法
Tap Control_L (⌃) → CapsLock (⇪); Hold Control_L (⌃) → Super Key (⌃⌥⌘)
Ctrl + Arrow Keys to Option + Arrow Keys
Ctrl + Shift + Arrow Keys to Option + Shift + Arrow Keys
Ctrl + BS/Del Keys to Option + BS/Del Keys
Ctrl + h to Option + left_Arrow Keys
Ctrl + l to Option + right_Arrow Keys
(Vim 1/11) caps_lock -> on, caps_lock, esc, control+[ or any pointing_button -> off
(Vim 3/11) visual mode + h,j,k,l,e,b,0,^,$,gg,G,{,} + d,y,c,x
(Vim 4/11) dd,de,db,d0,d^,d$,dgg,dG,d{,d}
(Vim 5/11) yy,ye,yb,y0,y^,y$,ygg,yG,y{,y}
(Vim 6/11) cc,ce,cb,c0,c^,c$,cgg,cG,c{,c}
(Vim 7/11) x,X,p,P,u,control+r
(Vim 8/11) h,j,k,l (+ control/option/command/shift),e,b,0,^,$,gg,G,{,}
(Vim 9/11) i,I,a,A,o,O
(Vim 11/11) disable unused keys
